title: Fragment, late 19th - early 20th century
medium:
Medium: silk; paint
Techinque: drawn and painted decoration on tabby checkered with small squares in twill effect
description: Flowering fruit boughs and butterflies in shades of blue-green, yellow-green and whit with touches of black and red, drawn in black outlines on pale mauve ground, with checkered effect. One broad tabby selvage.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, late 19th - early 20th century.Medium: silk; paint
Techinque: drawn and painted decoration on tabby checkered with small squares in twill effect. 1957-92-31.
